Northern NJ's Trusted Garage Door Experts

When you need reliable garage door repair in Northern NJ, Ez2Fix provides licensed, professional service across 70+ cities in Bergen County, Essex County, Morris County, Hudson County, and Passaic Counties. Our emergency garage door service is available 24/7 for urgent repairs throughout Northern New Jersey, including garage door installation, spring repair, and opener services.

How It Works

We make garage door repair simple and stress-free.

1. Call or Book

Contact us 24/7. We'll schedule a same-day appointment that fits your schedule.

2. We Fix It

Our licensed technician diagnoses the issue, gives a clear price, and fixes it on the spot.

3. Relax

Enjoy your safe, working garage door backed by our 10-year warranty.

Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to common questions about our garage door services in Northern NJ

Do you offer same-day garage door repair service?

Yes! We offer same-day service for most repairs in Northern New Jersey. For emergencies, we offer 24/7 service to get your garage door working promptly.

What areas do you serve in Northern New Jersey?

We proudly serve 70+ cities across Northern New Jersey, including Essex, Bergen, Hudson, Passaic, and Morris counties. Our primary service areas include Newark, Jersey City, Paterson, Elizabeth, Clifton, and Hackensack.

Are you licensed and insured?

Yes, Ez2Fix LLC is fully licensed (License #13VH13553300), bonded, and insured to operate in New Jersey. All our technicians are trained, certified, and carry liability insurance for your protection.

What warranty do you offer on repairs and installations?

We offer a 10-year warranty on spring replacements and new door installations, covering both parts and labor. Opener installations include manufacturer warranties plus our 1-year labor warranty.

Do you provide free estimates?

Yes! We provide free, no-obligation on-site estimates for all services. Our technicians will assess your garage door, explain the problem, provide upfront pricing, and answer all your questions before starting any work.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept cash, all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), debit cards, and checks. Payment is due upon completion of service.
